original_text: They are Israelite people. God chose them to belong to him as his own children. He showed them that he is very great. He made many agreements with them and he gave his Law to them. He showed them how they should worship him. He promised many good things to them.
korean_text: 그들은 이스라엘 사람이라 그들에게는 양자 됨과 영광과 언약들과 율법을 세우신 것과 예배와 약속들이 있고

sentences.original_text: to belong to him as his own children.
He showed them that he is very great.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 매우 위대하다는 것을 그들에게 보여주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He made many agreements with them
and he gave his Law to them.
He showed them how they should worship him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 어떻게 경배해야 하는지 그들에게 보여주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He promised many good things to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 많은 좋은 것들을 약속하셨습니다.
